About.title: About Me
About.specialization: with a focus on building reliable web platforms and developer tooling.
About.passion: I enjoy coding and problem-solving, and I enjoy creating fast, accessible, and responsive websites. I'm always eager to learn new technologies and enhance my skills.
About.callToAction: If you're looking for someone passionate about technology, let's connect!

WhatIdo.title: What I do
WhatIdo.description: I focus on creating modern, user-friendly web experiences with attention to detail and performance.
WhatIdo.designDescription: Creating intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces with modern design principles.
WhatIdo.animationDescription: Adding smooth animations and micro-interactions to enhance user experience.
WhatIdo.responsiveDescription: Building websites that work seamlessly across all devices and screen sizes.
